reviewText: Quality is good. Show is good.

i chose this 5 star rating, because initial d series are awesome.  i have all of them now, and they are an awesome series.  i recommend these series to anyone, that loves race car racing with other racers.  i love these initial d series, because there are different names for these racers, and my favorite one is the red suns.  i definitely recommend buying these whole series, because there fun to watch of which team racers win against the others ^_^.

i could not possibly give the 'Tokyo Pop' versions of initial D a five star rating due to the differences from the original show in japan v/s the 'Tokyo Pop' version. I've noticed that their are scenes that are cut out from the 'Tokyo Pop' version, but understandibly maybe bot suitable for kids and some of weak composure.

then again, i truly love the show, and must support it.

"Initial D: Second Stage" reaches its exciting conclusion with the exciting battle between Aki and Tak - the two men who have the skill and determination to push their Eight-Sixes to the limit. Will Tak finally be able to utilize the true and awesome power of his Eight-Six Trueno and its new engine, or will he be left in the dust by Aki and his turbo-charged Eight-Six Levin? Find out as the two go head to head in a mountain race you won't soon forget!
